DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine the effect of pneumatic compression devices (PCDs) on central blood volume in hemodialysis patients. We hypothesize that PCDs will help maintain central blood volume, and therefore prevent sudden decreases in blood pressure during hemodialysis.
DOC.criteria: on hemodialysis at least 3 months on hemodialysis at least 3 times per week dialyzing with a central venous catheter vascular access dysfunction peripheral vascular disease active medical issue unable to provide informed consent
